name: The Two Ways
description:
There are two ways. I know what the first is, but nobody will tell me about the second. 

Psalm 1: The Two Ways is a short piece of interactive fiction. I'll ask you some questions. You can give me some answers. That's it. 

Warning: In this game, you are expected to tell lies. If that makes you uncomfortable, please do not play. 

Psalms is an anthology of short digital fiction. Some entries are games, others are visual novels. And some - well, you'll see. Check in for new psalms every quarter.
